result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ga: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.orig: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.html: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bealaċ a roġnófá le haġaiḋ an líne traenaċ nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?

result.eng: Please stand behind the yellow line.
result.ga: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.orig: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.html: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.
result.ponchtml: Seasaigí taoḃ ṫiar den líne ḃuí le ḃur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.

result.html: Tharraing sé líneHe drew a line.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé líneHe drew a line.

result.eng: They have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ga: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.orig: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.html: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ponchtml: Tá plean acu líne traenaċ nua a ṫógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.orig: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.html: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadhCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil Tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.eng: On the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
result.ga: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéire
result.orig: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéire
result.html: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéireOn the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
result.ponchtml: Ar an gceaṫrú lá ċonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéireOn the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
